title: How do I update the weather?
answer:
Touch ![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/13224_gbqxn.png) in the lower left corner to update the weather.

[![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/13225_me3dj.png)](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/13225_me3dj.png)

Touch ![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/13226_4vg1x.png) to display the Manage cities screen. Touch ![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/13227_r8naa.png) to display the Settings screen.

You will then be able to set Temperature unit, Update interval, and Weather tones.

[![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/13228_mo0ms.png)](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/13228_mo0ms.png) [![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/13229_ynqho.png)](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/13229_ynqho.png)
